title: Monsters and Creatures SFX Pack
description: A massive pack of high-quality, professionally produced monsters and creatures sounds for any your game!
longDescription:
🔊 Listen to the Preview Here

📄 Check the File List

Ever wondered when looking at the graceful fight scenes, why do they look so captivating? This is the merit of sounds! In Ishodus Studio we specialize in the development and creation of the sounds you need to fill your game world with new colors. We have created a whole set of sounds such as environments, monsters, interactions, weapons, gore, footsteps, and more to make your project sound amazing.


THE NAMES ON MONSTERS IT'S JUST AN EXAMPLES, YOU CAN USE SOUNDS FOR ANY CREATURES YOU WANT!


THIS PACK CAN BE USED FOR ANY GAME GENRE


This pack it's a part of our action-rpg sounds series that contains 320 high-quality and Triple AAA quality sounds of monsters and creatures like Ancient Mammoth, Basilisk, Boar, Brontosaurus, Giant, DragonÂ and more for any game!


Includes 16 monsters and creatures - each monster has 20 sounds:

  • Ancient Mammoth sounds - Attack, Damage, Idle, Death, Scream
  • Basilisk sounds - Attack, Damage, Idle, Death, Scream
  • Boar sounds - Attack, Damage, Idle, Death, Scream
  • Brontosaurus sounds - Attack, Damage, Idle, Death, Scream
  • Cave Bear sounds - Attack, Damage, Idle, Death, Scream
  • Great Dragon sounds - Attack, Damage, Idle, Death, Scream
  • Giant sounds - Attack, Damage, Idle, Death, Scream
  • King Snake sounds - Attack, Damage, Idle, Death, Scream
  • Massive Spider sounds - Attack, Damage, Idle, Death, Scream
  • Phoenix sounds - Attack, Damage, Idle, Death, Scream
  • Pterodactyl sounds - Attack, Damage, Idle, Death, Scream
  • Rhinoceros sounds - Attack, Damage, Idle, Death, Scream
  • Saber Toothed Tiger sounds - Attack, Damage, Idle, Death, Scream
  • Tyrannosaurus sounds - Attack, Damage, Idle, Death, Scream
  • Velociraptor sounds - Attack, Damage, Idle, Death, Scream
  • Wyvern sounds - Attack, Damage, Idle, Death, Scream

For more information please check the File List

This pack is a part of Action RPG Sounds series(UPCOMING).
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 320

Number of Audio Cues: 320

Sample rate / bit rate: 48000 Hz/ 1536 kbps

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 26 minutes 26 seconds, 26:26

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://soundcloud.com/tt-production-853368438/monsters-and-creatures-sound-fx-preview?si=a1d16a90260f47a2b7b374b7390ce74b&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing

Important/Additional Notes: This pack can be used in any game genre
